String get_time_string_from_system(utc: bool = false) const ğŸ”—
å½“ utc ä¸º false æ—¶ï¼Œè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ç³»ç»Ÿçš„æœ¬åœ°æ—¶é—´ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸º UTC æ—¶é—´ã€‚
Returns the current time zone as a dictionary of keys: bias and name.

list_item.paragraph: bias is the offset from UTC in minutes, since not all time zones are multiples of an hour from UTC.
name is the localized name of the time zone, according to the OS locale settings of the current user.
